entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
